oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On equicontinuity of inverse mappings in metric spaces
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sevost'yanov, E. A.
Skvortsov, S. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Metric Geometry
30C65
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: For homeomorphisms in metric spaces satisfying one inequality with respect to modulus of families of curves, there is proved a theorem on continuous extension of inverse mappings. For the families of mappings mentioned above, there are proved theorems on equicontinuity in the closure of a domain.
